privacy.title: How we handle your data
privacy.intro: We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with statutory data protection rules. Below you find the most important information at a glance.

paragraphs.controller: The controller is {{company}}, {{owner}}, {{addressLine1}}, {{addressLine2}}, {{country}}. You can reach us at {{email}}.
paragraphs.purpose: We process the data submitted via the form solely to handle your enquiry and arrange appointments. Legal basis is Art. 6 (1) lit. b GDPR.
paragraphs.sharing: We only share data with third parties if necessary to fulfil the contract (e.g. subcontractors) or if there is a legal obligation. Data will be deleted once the purpose no longer applies.
paragraphs.rights: You can request information, rectification, deletion, restriction of processing, data portability or object to processing at any time. You may also revoke any consent you have given.
paragraphs.more: Please see our detailed privacy policy for further information. We are happy to answer any questions.

privacy.metaDescription: We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with statutory data protection rules. Below you find the most important information at a glance.

cookies.title: Cookie policy according to GDPR & TTDSG
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to keep our website functional, improve our services and – with your consent – measure reach and enable marketing. Here you will find information about the categories we use, storage periods and how to manage your choices.

controller.title: 1. Controller
controller.text: Cookies are managed by Handwerker Reiser, Max Reiser, Musterstraße 12, 80331 Munich, Germany. Questions? Contact us via kontakt@handwerker-reiser.de.

legal.title: 2. Legal basis (Art. 6 (1) GDPR & § 25 TTDSG)
legal.text: Technically necessary cookies rely on Art. 6 (1) lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest) and § 25 (2) No. 2 TTDSG. All other cookies are only set if you expressly consent in line with Art. 6 (1) lit. a GDPR and § 25 (1) TTDSG.

items.essential: Essential cookies: ensure basic functionality of the website (e.g. language settings, log-in, consent banner).
items.functional: Functional cookies: enable additional services such as embedded maps, chat or booking widgets. Without consent these remain inactive.
items.analytics: Analytics/statistics cookies: help us understand how visitors use the site so we can improve content.
items.marketing: Marketing/personalisation cookies: show relevant content and offers – also on partner sites.

tools.title: 4. Tools used & storage period
tools.text: A current list of providers (e.g. Google Analytics, Meta Pixel, scheduling widgets) is available in our consent tool. There you can also see storage periods and whether data is transferred to third countries. We regularly review providers for GDPR compliance and conclude the necessary data processing agreements.

consent.title: 5. Manage or withdraw consent
consent.text: You can change or withdraw your choice at any time via the cookie banner (“Adjust cookies”). You can also delete existing cookies in your browser settings. Please note that some functions may no longer be available after withdrawal.

steps.one: Scroll to the footer and click “Adjust cookies”.
steps.two: Select the desired categories (essential, functional, analytics, marketing).

browser.title: 6. Browser settings
browser.text: Manage or disable cookies in these popular browsers:

thirdCountry.title: 7. Third-country transfers
thirdCountry.text: Some providers process data outside the EU/EEA where data protection may differ. Transfers take place only with appropriate safeguards (e.g. EU Standard Contractual Clauses) or if you have given explicit consent.

rights.title: 8. Your rights
rights.text: You have the right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability and to object. Withdrawn consents remain effective for the past processing.

update.title: 9. Updates to this policy
update.text: We update this cookie policy whenever our tools, legal requirements or internal processes change. The most recent update date is shown below.
